text: First time doing MRI and the overall experience was pretty good. The waiting time is short and the nurse Lina is super helpful and caring. She explained the procedure well and  make sure I am comfortable at all times.

Well furbished medical screening centre with pretty extensive screening services... MRI, Xray, Mammogram, Radioscropes...etc

Quick registration by friendly receptionist and efficient scanning by radiologist made the process a breeze

Quite far from main road though... but an easy place to go for medical screening matters if one drive

The receptionist and the clinic staff are very warm and friendly. It was my first time doing MRI scan, they make me feel safe and assured. The scan procedure will clearly explained and when it was complete, the staff will make sure I am okay prior to getting up. Overall, a smooth and fuss free procedure. The clinic was also well maintained and clean. The medical equipment looks high tech too.
The staff were super lovely, making sure I was properly comfortable before my MRI, facilities well maintained and comfortable as well.
Reception staff was awful. Even though no one in the queue, they take too much time for just an Xray. Radiation staff was good.
